code: import{useEffect,useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[users,setUsers]=useState([]);const[form,setForm]=useState({name:"",email:""});const fetchUsers=async()=>{const res=await axios.get("http://backend-service:3001/users");setUsers(res.data);};useEffect(()=>{fetchUsers();},[]);const addUser=async()=>{await axios.post("http://backend-service:3001/users",form);fetchUsers();};const deleteUser=async id=>{await axios.delete(`http://backend-service:3001/users/${id}`);fetchUsers();};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"CRUD with MySQL"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"Name",onChange:e=>setForm({...form,name:e.target.value})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"Email",onChange:e=>setForm({...form,email:e.target.value})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:addUser,children:"Add"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:users.map(user=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[user.name," (",user.email,")",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>deleteUser(user.id),children:"\u274C"})]},user.id))})]});}export default App;
